newsitem.title: USA: U.S. CREDIT OUTLOOK--Data scarce, technicals rule.
newsitem.headline: U.S. CREDIT OUTLOOK--Data scarce, technicals rule.

text.p: With no key economic data due until later in the week, U.S. Treasuries are expected to stick to very tight ranges on Tuesday, mainly focusing on technical factors, players said.
The market, unable to sustain Friday's runup on Monday, offers more downside risk amid a steady stream of corporate and asset-backed supply.
Losses are seen limited, however, since the market anticipates bond-friendly economic news beginning on Thursday.
